com.linkedin.cubert.operator

Interface TupleOperator

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    BlockIndexJoinOperator, CombineOperator, CubeOperator, DictionaryDecodeOperator, DictionaryEncodeOperator, DistinctOperator, DuplicateOperator, ExtractMedianOperator, FilterOperator, FlattenBagOperator, GatherOperator, GenerateOperator, GroupByOperator, HashJoinOperator, LimitOperator, MedianFlattenOperator, MergeJoinOperator, NullOperator, SortOperator, TeeOperator, TopNOperator, ValidateOperator

    public interface TupleOperator
    Interface for operators that generate tuples by processing input cubes.
